column4: when my pc is unplugged at the wall for more than 10 minutes I cannot boot it again next time. I had to open it and swap the jumper cables of my two hard drives. How can I fix this from happening over and over?
<< hardware problem, nothing to do with linux
ok, can you direct me to the right channel then? I thought you guys know ... by the way linux is inside that hardware!
guntbert thank you guys. let me go there right now
